mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view the list of advertisements.
List advertisements view displays the list of advertisements to Admin.
Admin clicks the edit button on an advertisement.
List advertisements view redirects to the edit advertisement page.
Edit advertisement view shows the content of the advertisement to Admin.
Admin edits the advertisement data and clicks the save button.
Edit advertisement view sends the information to AdsController.
AdsController saves the data in the AdsModel.
AdsModel returns the saved data to AdsController.
AdsController returns the save result to edit advertisement view.
Edit advertisement view displays the edited advertisement to Admin.
